metadata.title: CVE-2024-22365 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
pam_namespace local denial of service

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-22365` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpam-modules - 1.5.2-6ubuntu1.1
libpam-modules-bin - 1.5.2-6ubuntu1.1
libpam-runtime - 1.5.2-6ubuntu1.1
libpam0g - 1.5.2-6ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pam package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5.2-6ubuntu1.1').
